The Contacts and Companies @hs-object in HubSpot have similar and interrelated roles.  They both can, at times, be considered the "customer" who made an Order.  The distinction between the two is sometimes a matter of intuitive categories, but sometimes more about how to manipulate certain behavior out the the data structure.
